translation.en: [narrator] Meet Terry Seattle, Homicide Division.
translation.fr:
Voici Terry Seattle,
de la brigade criminelle.

translation.en: For Terry, every day, means a new murder case,
translation.fr:
Pour Terry, à chaque jour,
son nouveau meurtre,

translation.en: and a new celebrity guest star as his partner.
translation.fr:
et une nouvelle célébrité
en guise d'équipier.

translation.en: Today's guest: comedy legend Conan O'Brien.
translation.fr:
Son équipier du jour :
la légende de la comédie Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: But here's the catch.
Conan isn't being given a script.
He has no idea what's about to happen.
translation.fr: ‎Il n'a aucune idée de ce qui l'attend.

translation.en: Together, he and Terry will have to improvise their way through the case.
translation.fr:
‎Ensemble, Terry et lui devront improviser
‎pour résoudre l'enquête.

translation.en: But it'll be up to Conan alone to name the killer.
translation.fr:
‎Mais il incombera à Conan
‎de désigner le coupable.

translation.en: So join them as they punch a one-way ticket
to Murderville.
[male deep voice] The big city.
Where only the strong survive…
translation.fr: Où règne la loi du plus fort.

translation.en: And the ruthless… thrive.
translation.fr: Le paradis des sans pitié et sans remords.

translation.en: I just made that rhyme up.
No big deal. I can do all sorts of cool stuff.
My name is Terry Seattle.
I'm a senior homicide detective. And I am killing it.
translation.fr: Je suis enquêteur criminel, et j'assure.

translation.en: Detective.
Morning, Chief.
Pleasure to see you.
Pleasure to see you. I hope you're doing very well.
translation.fr: De même. Vous vous portez bien ?

translation.en: I am doing very well. Thank you.
You need to come past the house and pick up the rest of your crap.
translation.fr:
Viens récupérer le reste de ton bordel
à la maison.

translation.en: That is not crap, Rhonda, that's 17 years of marriage.
translation.fr:
C'est pas du bordel, Rhonda.
C'est 17 ans de mariage.

translation.en: It's a broken PlayStation 2, some old Maxim magazines,
translation.fr:
On parle d'une PlayStation 2 cassée,
de vieux magazines coquins,

translation.en: a car wash receipt signed by Axl Rose
translation.fr: d'un reçu signé par Axl Rose,

translation.en: and a "Take me drunk I'm home" t-shirt.
translation.fr:
et d'un T-shirt
"Ramène-moi ivre, je suis chez moi".

translation.en: If you had read just one of those Maxim articles,
translation.fr: Si t'avais lu un seul de ces magazines,

translation.en: you would know that as a modern male--
translation.fr: tu saurais que de nos jours…

translation.en: Terry, come get your shit or I'm throwing it out.
translation.fr: Terry, récupère ton bordel ou je le jette.

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Don't pout, Detective. I've got a present for you.
translation.fr: Ne boude pas. J'ai une surprise pour toi.

translation.en: A new partner.
No, you can't be serious. Come on, my life's not going wrong enough as it is
translation.fr:
Non, pas ça.
Ma vie va déjà assez de travers.

translation.en: that I gotta babysit some homicide trainee?
translation.fr: Je veux pas jouer la nounou d'un apprenti.

translation.en: Do you not remember what happened when I babysat your nephew?
translation.fr:
Tu as oublié la fois
où j'ai gardé ton neveu ?

translation.en: Come on out, Conan.
[Rhonda] Come a little closer.
I never liked to presume how close I can get.
[Rhonda] That's just fine.
Terry, meet your new partner, Conan O'Brien.
translation.fr:
Terry, voici ton nouvel équipier :
Conan O'Brien.

translation.en: Conan, this is senior detective, Terry Seattle.
translation.fr:
Conan, voici l'inspecteur en chef
Terry Seattle.

translation.en: Good to see you, sir. How are you?
Got quite a grip on you, huh?
-[Conan] Yeah. -Good Lord.
-[Terry] Yes. [chuckles] -[Conan] Yeah, okay. Yeah.
Put your fingers in your ears.
Are you joking?
I mean, did I just turn seven years old? Because you hired a goddamn clown!
translation.fr:
Tu m'as pris pour un gamin de sept ans ?
Pourquoi t'as engagé un clown ?

translation.en: You're the only detective who can't keep a partner.
translation.fr:
T'es le seul
incapable de garder un équipier.

translation.en: Yeah, because they're all idiots!
I mean, look at this guy with his fingers in his ears. I mean, God!
translation.fr:
Regarde-le,
avec ses doigts dans les oreilles !

translation.en: I can actually,
the fingers don't actually block out the sound that well,
translation.fr: ça ne bloque pas vraiment le son.

translation.en: so I heard clown, I heard idiot.
Terry, make it work.
Nice to meet you.
Let me tell you something.
This ginger monstrosity is the biggest mistake in the history of city homicide!
translation.fr:
Ce monstre roux est la pire recrue
de l'histoire !

translation.en: No offense.
None taken.
You seem very nervous.
It's my first day on the job and you're a bit of a legend, so.
translation.fr:
C'est mon premier jour,
et vous êtes une légende.

translation.en: It's Terry Seattle. Is that it?
You do more bowing than a goddamn Tommy Tune.
translation.fr: Tu t'inclines plus que Tommy Tune.

translation.en: Okay, bit of an outdated reference if you ask me, but--
translation.fr: Cette référence est un peu démodée.

translation.en: Follow me.
-It's a great office you have here. -[chuckles]
Talker.
Yeah. Okay.
Senior detective, Terry Seattle. And no, I've never been.
translation.fr:
Terry Seattle, inspecteur en chef.
Et non, j'y suis jamais allé.

translation.en: That was gonna be my first question.
-Of course it was. -Yeah.
I got married in Seattle.
translation.fr: Je me suis marié à Seattle.

translation.en: What?
I got married in Seattle.
No, I mean, you got married?
Yeah.
To what?
To a wonderful woman.
Does she know?
She has an idea. Let's just put it that way.
Listen,
I hope you don't take this personal,
but I'm not really looking for a new partner. I already had the best.
translation.fr:
mais je veux pas de nouvel équipier.
J'ai déjà eu la meilleure.

translation.en: Her name was Lori Griffin. And she was murdered 15 years ago.
translation.fr:
Elle s'appelait Lori Griffin.
Elle a été assassinée il y a 15 ans.

translation.en: And out of respect for Lori Griffin,
her desk has remained completely untouched.
translation.fr: son bureau n'a plus jamais été touché.

translation.en: Since that night.
Everything is the same, just the way she left it. Her case notes,
translation.fr:
Il est tel qu'elle l'avait laissé.
Avec ses notes,

translation.en: her uneaten breakfast burrito,
her pet rabbit, Gulliver. God, I miss that little guy.
translation.fr: et son lapin, Gulliver. Il me manque.

translation.en: You know, you can feed those things even after the owner's gone.
translation.fr:
Vous auriez pu continuer à le nourrir
après sa mort.

translation.en: It would not be respectful to touch it.
Just feed and water them, a rabbit can live--
translation.fr:
Avec à manger et à boire,
un lapin peut vivre…

translation.en: Disrespectful.
40 years.
Disrespectful.
What'd you do prior to this,
before you decided to become a homicide detective? What kind of work were you in?
Been a lot of things. An entertainer for a while. I, uh--
translation.fr: Pas mal de choses. J'ai été animateur, et…

translation.en: Yeah. Well, listen, none of that matters now. Nobody cares.
translation.fr: Ça n'a plus d'importance. On s'en fiche.

translation.en: -Well, you just asked. -No, but none of it matters.
translation.fr:
- C'est vous qui avez demandé.
- On s'en fiche.

translation.en: City homicide isn't for precious little man-boys
translation.fr:
La brigade criminelle est pas faite
pour les gamins

translation.en: who are afraid to get their lips dirty and their pants wet. Okay?
translation.fr:
qui ont peur de se salir les lèvres
et de mouiller leur pantalon.

translation.en: No, I wouldn't think so.
'Cause you don't know anything about getting your lips dirty, do you?
translation.fr: Tu t'es jamais sali les lèvres, si ?

translation.en: You probably keep your lips real clean.
I can get these lips as dirty as you want them to be.
translation.fr: Je les salirai autant que vous voudrez.

translation.en: Just covered in all kinds of stuff.
City homicide, we're bad dudes.
I'm a bad dude. Are you a bad dude?
Listen,
you are a bad mofo. Everyone knows it.
translation.fr: On sait tous que vous êtes un caïd.

translation.en: And I want to get in there. I want to get my hands dirty, my lips dirty.
translation.fr:
Je veux en être.
Me salir les mains et les lèvres.

translation.en: I want to solve whatever case comes our way.
translation.fr: Je veux résoudre n'importe quelle enquête.

translation.en: He's got the goods.
He's got what it takes to be a hard-ass, homicide detective trainee.
translation.fr:
Il a la trempe
d'un apprenti enquêteur dur à cuire.

translation.en: Well, that's good news. Because there's been a murder.
translation.fr: Tant mieux, car un meurtre a eu lieu.

translation.en: What?
A magician performing at the grand opening of the city library
translation.fr:
Un magicien qui se produisait
à l'inauguration de la bibliothèque

translation.en: sawed his assistant in half
translation.fr: a scié son assistante en deux,

translation.en: but couldn't put her back together again.
[grunts] Classic Humpty Dumpty.
I need you two down there on the double.
Goodbye, Chief.
You ready to go solve this murder?
I am. I'm ready to go.
-Yeah, let's get going. -All right.
[Terry] We took my '82 Dodge Rampage
translation.fr: À bord de mon Dodge Rampage de 1982,

translation.en: over to the library to check out the crime scene.
translation.fr: on s'est rendus sur la scène du crime.

translation.en: It was time for Conan to take off his training diaper
translation.fr:
Il était temps pour Conan
d'enlever sa couche d'apprenti

translation.en: and start pooping his pants like a big boy.
translation.fr:
et de souiller son pantalon
comme un grand garçon.

translation.en: Terry Seattle, Senior Detec-- Doesn't matter.
You don't need to show-- we're in a crime scene, okay?
translation.fr:
Inutile de montrer…
C'est une scène de crime.

translation.en: I think we should find out what the hell went on here.
translation.fr: Tâchons de découvrir ce qu'il s'est passé.

translation.en: -Officers. -Officers.
I already said officers.
Okay.
Well, well, look at this guy.
Hola, Seattle.
You must be Terry's new partner.
Yes. I'm his new partner, Conan O'Brien. What's your name?
translation.fr: Oui, Conan O'Brien. Et vous êtes ?

translation.en: Detective Darren Phillips. Most people call me Daz.
translation.fr:
Inspecteur Darren Phillips.
Mais on m'appelle Daz.

translation.en: Nobody call-- I don't call you Daz at all.
[Daz] It's a pleasure.
Detective Phillips, honor to see you. What's going on?
translation.fr: C'est un honneur. Que s'est-il passé ?

translation.en: All right, stop schmoozing with this guy. What's wrong? You're just embarrassing.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu lui lèches les bottes ?
Tu me fais honte.

translation.en: Just tell him it's our crime scene and get the hell out of here.
translation.fr:
Dis-lui que c'est notre enquête
et envoie-le paître.

translation.en: Hey, this is our crime scene. We're taking lead on this one.
translation.fr:
C'est notre scène de crime.
On prend le relais.

translation.en: We understand there's been a homicide murder.
Uh, victim sawed in half during some kind of magical performance, if you will.
translation.fr:
La victime a été sciée en deux
durant un tour de magie.

translation.en: Why are you telling him? He's an officer.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu lui dis ça ?
C'est un inspecteur.

translation.en: I'm reviewing the facts of what I've heard so far.
translation.fr: Je récapitule ce que j'ai appris.

translation.en: Let's continue. Sir, please. How can we help?
translation.fr:
Continuons.
En quoi pouvons-nous vous aider ?

translation.en: What do we got here?
This gentleman is Captivating Keith.
It was his assistant who got sawed in half.
translation.fr: Son assistante a été sciée en deux.

translation.en: I don't know what happened, man.
My assistant, Sarah and me, we just--
we did the same routine we've always done.
translation.fr: On faisait le même numéro que d'habitude.

translation.en: Somebody must have gone in and they must have
replaced the trick saw with a real saw.
translation.fr: et remplacer la fausse scie par une vraie.

translation.en: The blood. There, there, blood. It's just everywhere! Blood!
translation.fr: Tout ce sang. Y en avait partout !

translation.en: Did you think at any point when there was all that blood
translation.fr:
En voyant tout ce sang,
ça ne vous a pas traversé l'esprit

translation.en: that maybe you should stop sawing? Did that occur to you?
translation.fr: d'arrêter ? Vous n'y avez pas pensé ?

translation.en: Maybe.
Did you have a safe word that you normally employ?
translation.fr: Vous aviez convenu d'un mot pour arrêter ?

translation.en: -Of course we had a safe word. -Okay.
If anything was to go wrong, my assistant was supposed to shout, "Stop!"
translation.fr:
En cas de problème,
mon assistante devait crier : "Stop !"

translation.en: But all I heard was, "Keith, you're sawing me in half."
translation.fr:
Mais elle m'a juste dit :
"Tu me coupes en deux."

translation.en: -I guess it's not the safe word. -No, they're not the same.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas le bon mot.
- En effet.

translation.en: -Yeah, well… Really isn't. -There's rules.
translation.fr:
- C'est vrai.
- La règle, c'est la règle.

translation.en: We're sorry for your loss.
Thank you.
[Terry] Amber.
This is Amber Kang. Forensics.
Nice to see you.
Homicide detective, Kang Coroner… Uh…
translation.fr: Inspectrice King, Mme la médecin légiste…

translation.en: -What…? -What? I'm sorry.
What are you doing? You're embarrassing, you're so nerv--
translation.fr: À quoi tu joues ? Tu me fais honte.

translation.en: I got nervous.
Amber, um…
we'd like to know what's happening here. State of the body… dead, I presume.
translation.fr:
expliquez-nous ce qu'il s'est passé.
Je suppose que le cadavre est… mort.

translation.en: Very dead.
What've we got here, Amber?
Let me take you over to the murder weapon.
Now, here's something interesting. No fingerprints.
translation.fr:
Ce qui est intéressant,
c'est qu'il n'y a aucune empreinte.

translation.en: But, you'll never guess what I did find on the handle.
translation.fr: Mais devinez ce qu'il y a sur le manche.

translation.en: Traces of hot sauce.
-Hot sauce on the handle. -Spicy.
[chuckles] The body is right there.
And you're being a total clown.
Now, just take it easy.
Uh… traces of hot sauce. Were you able to trace what kind of hot sauce?
translation.fr:
Vous savez
de quelle sauce piquante il s'agit ?

translation.en: Not yet, but we also found trace amounts of pet hair.
translation.fr:
Pas encore. On a aussi trouvé
des poils d'origine animale.

translation.en: Most likely a small animal.
Interesting.
What are you thinking? Maybe a beagle out for revenge?
Anything else, Amber?
Well, did you take a look at the suitcase?
Says this is where Captivating Keith kept his trick saw.
translation.fr:
Keith Le Captivant rangeait
sa fausse scie dedans.

translation.en: Now apparently, he was the only one with a key
translation.fr: Apparemment, lui seul en avait la clé.

translation.en: so someone must have picked the lock, switched the saws.
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un a dû crocheter la serrure
et échanger les scies.

translation.en: [girl] Excuse me, Mr. Policeman.
Yes?
When is the magician going to finish the trick?
translation.fr: Le magicien va bientôt finir son numéro ?

translation.en: Well,
I'm gonna look at some evidence
and this tall, young gentleman here
translation.fr: pendant que ce grand et gentil monsieur

translation.en: will be happy to answer any of your questions.
[Terry] So…
Hello, what's your name?
When is the magician going to put the lady back together?
translation.fr:
Le magicien va bientôt
réassembler la dame ?

translation.en: Well,
the lady can't go back together
translation.fr: La dame ne peut pas être réassemblée,

translation.en: because what happened,
is the magician
really sawed her in half,
translation.fr: l'a sciée en deux pour de vrai.

translation.en: cut through skin,
ligament, muscle, bone.
translation.fr: ses ligaments, ses muscles et ses os.

translation.en: She had instantaneous, probably 90% blood loss
translation.fr:
Elle a instantanément perdu
90 % de son sang,

translation.en: and then she went into that black void
translation.fr: puis elle a rejoint le grand vide noir

translation.en: known as death.
Where there is no return.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas en revenir.

translation.en: She's gone. Gone forever.
translation.fr: Elle s'en est allée. Pour toujours.

translation.en: What does that all even mean? I don't--
She's dead.
-I just don't understand-- -She's so dead.
I just don't understand. Is magic real or not?
It's a very simple question, sir. It's a yes or no!
It's not magic. It is magic.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas de la magie.
- Si.

translation.en: -God. -Look at the sign behind you.
Yeah, I know. That's what grown-ups call a lie.
translation.fr:
Je sais.
C'est ce qu'on appelle un mensonge.

translation.en: Is this what dying is?
That's what I told you. Yes, this is what dying is like.
translation.fr: Je viens de te le dire. Oui, c'est ça.

translation.en: She'll go to heaven, right?
Oh, well, I don't know.
Will she still be in two pieces when she's in heaven?
translation.fr:
Elle sera encore en deux morceaux
au paradis ?

translation.en: Well, no, my guess is, before they put her in the ground--
translation.fr: Non. Je crois qu'avant de l'enterrer…

translation.en: All right, trainee, let's go. We found some new evidence.
translation.fr:
En route, apprenti.
On a de nouvelles preuves.

translation.en: [grunts] Was on my knee for a long time.
[Terry] Our first suspect was Captivating Keith's former assistant, Deb.
translation.fr:
Notre première suspecte
était l'ancienne assistante de Keith, Deb. Elle avait été renvoyée et remplacée

translation.en: She'd recently been fired and replaced
translation.fr:
Elle avait été renvoyée et remplacée par la plus jeune,
et désormais plus morte, Sarah.

translation.en: with the much younger and now much deader, Sarah.
translation.fr:
par la plus jeune,
et désormais plus morte, Sarah.

translation.en: Welcome to Quirky Jack's Homestyle Eatery.
translation.fr:
Bienvenue
chez Quirky Jack's Homestyle Eatery.

translation.en: Where we serve heaping portions of whimsy and medium-sized portions of food.
translation.fr:
On y sert une grande dose de fantaisie
et des portions moyennes.

translation.en: My name is Deb, I'll be your server.
Can I start you off with a bowl of our world-famous deep-fried chowder?
translation.fr:
Puis-je vous proposer un bol
de notre fameuse soupe de poisson ?

translation.en: We're not really hungry for food, Deb.
translation.fr: On ne veut pas de nourriture, Deb.

translation.en: We are hungry for answers.
Is this about what happened to Sarah at Keith's magic show?
That's right. It is about what happened to Sarah.
Okay. Listen, I'll talk to you, but you're gonna have to order something
translation.fr:
Je veux bien vous parler,
mais vous devez commander.

translation.en: because otherwise my boss is gonna get mad.
Okay. Yeah, well, I could eat something.
Sure, yeah. I'll have…
Oh, you know what, they got the sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.fr: Ils ont des sandwichs au piment.

translation.en: They're back. Yeah, we'll take two of those. The sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.fr:
Ils sont de retour.
On va vous en prendre deux.

translation.en: Do you want to add two sloparitas for five bucks more?
translation.fr:
Voulez-vous deux pimargaritas
pour cinq dollars de plus ?

translation.en: -[Conan] Let's do it. -Two, dos, sloparitas.
-Yes. -I'll be back with your food.
You're gonna love this sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.fr: Tu vas adorer leur sandwich au piment.

translation.en: You have never had a wetter sandwich. It's unbelievable.
translation.fr: Il est humide à souhait. Délicieux.

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm looking forward to it.
It's like eating throw up. That's delicious.
translation.fr: C'est comme manger du vomi. Un régal.

translation.en: All right, we got two sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
Yes, we sure do.
And two sloparitas.
Two sloparitas.
This is good. And you gotta try some of this signature spicy slop sauce.
translation.fr: Un régal. Goûte leur sauce piquante.

translation.en: [Terry] You know, it just makes it extra sloppy.
[Deb] That is extremely hot…
Yeah. That's good. You have never had a sloppier sandwich.
translation.fr: C'est bien. Y a pas plus imbibé.

translation.en: -Get right into it, huh? -[Terry] Yup. Eat up.
Yeah, I got other tables, so…
Well, I don't have other murders. So.
-God, it's wet. -Okay.
Yeah, okay.
[Terry] That is a sloppy sandwich.
-[Deb] I tried to warn you. -Yeah.
[Terry] All right, you got some questions in your notebook.
translation.fr: T'as des questions dans ton carnet.

translation.en: [Deb] Yeah, did you have questions for me?
translation.fr: Vous aviez des questions pour moi ?

translation.en: Go ahead. Shoot. This is your time to shine.
-Jesus Christ. -[Terry] Hey, we haven't got all day.
translation.fr:
- Nom de Dieu.
- On n'a pas que ça à faire.

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry.
Wanna take another bite first? Are you hungry?
Let me get that sloppy for you. You've never had a sloppy sandwich.
translation.fr:
Je vais te l'imbiber.
T'as jamais goûté ça.

translation.en: -Well, this is great. -Just slop it. Really slop it.
No, it's great. It's very aggressive on your part.
translation.fr: Super. C'est très agressif de votre part.

translation.en: [Terry] Go ahead.
[Terry] Dive in there, Conan.
Is it true Captivating Keith
translation.fr: Est-il vrai que Keith Le Captivant

translation.en: replaced you with Sarah 'cause he thought you'd gotten too old?
translation.fr:
vous a remplacée par Sarah
car il vous jugeait trop vieille ?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Conan. What the hell's wrong with you?
translation.fr: Bon sang. Ça va pas la tête ?

translation.en: I spent the best years of my life
translation.fr:
J'ai passé
les plus belles années de ma vie

translation.en: getting shoved into boxes and like, attacked
translation.fr:
à me faire enfermer dans des boîtes
ou attaquer

translation.en: by doves or very mean animals.
For what? So I can be replaced
translation.fr: Tout ça pour quoi ? Pour être remplacée

translation.en: by some 19-year-old with fake boobs
translation.fr:
par une fille de 19 ans
à la poitrine refaite,

translation.en: who doesn't even know how to pick a closed-shackle padlock.
translation.fr:
qui n'est même pas fichue
de crocheter un cadenas.

translation.en: [Deb] It's humiliating!
Get in there! You're not--
I don't know what you're talking about! I'm eating everything!
[Deb] He's right. You're not slopping the Joe.
translation.fr: Il a raison. C'est pas suffisant.

translation.en: I wanna die.
Another question for you.
Is it safe to say you held a grudge against Sarah?
translation.fr: Peut-on dire que vous en vouliez à Sarah ?

translation.en: Duh! Wouldn't you?
Probably.
What's wrong with your face?
I have high blood pressure.
Is there anyone else who might have wanted to hurt her?
translation.fr: Qui d'autre aurait pu vouloir sa mort ?

translation.en: She used to be another magician's assistant. Magic Melvin.
translation.fr:
Elle travaillait pour un autre magicien,
Magic Melvin.

translation.en: Magic Melvin?
Yeah. I heard they separated on bad terms, so you could talk to him.
translation.fr:
Oui. Ils se sont quittés
en mauvais termes. Parlez-lui.

translation.en: [Terry] You okay?
Maybe you need to get in that sloppy--
No, I can't. I honestly, I have had so much of that right now.
translation.fr: Non, j'en peux plus. J'ai trop mangé.

translation.en: -Everything's gonna be okay. -[Deb] It's not gonna be okay!
Dude, look at my life!
No one wants to hire a 40-year-old magician's assistant!
translation.fr:
Personne ne veut embaucher
une assistante de magicien de 40 ans !

translation.en: Oh, please.
I work in this crappy job.
My clothes smell like steam meat. My stupid boyfriend tried to cheer me up
translation.fr:
Mes vêtements sentent la viande.
Mon petit ami a voulu me réconforter

translation.en: by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies.
translation.fr:
en m'offrant un chiot,
mais je suis allergique.

translation.en: So, I had to tell him, "You can't keep that dog in my house."
translation.fr: J'ai dû lui dire de reprendre le chien.

translation.en: And then he said, "I can't talk right now, Deb. I'm with my wife and kids."
translation.fr:
Il m'a répondu : "Pas le temps.
Je suis avec ma femme et mes gosses."

translation.en: "And you know we have boundaries."
So, now I have no choice but to go over to his house
translation.fr: Maintenant, je dois aller chez lui

translation.en: and make a scene in front of his entire family.
translation.fr: et faire une scène devant sa famille.

translation.en: I'll take this when you're ready.
[Terry] Thanks to Deb's tip,
we brought Captivating Keith's rival, Magic Melvin, in for questioning.
translation.fr:
on a fait venir Magic Melvin au poste
pour l'interroger.

translation.en: It was time for Conan and me to take the gloves off.
translation.fr:
Il était temps de passer
à la vitesse supérieure.

translation.en: We got a suspect. We got this guy Melvin coming in.
-We're gonna break this guy. -Okay.
translation.fr:
- On va le faire parler.
- D'accord.

translation.en: We're gonna break his will.
Want to do good cop bad cop? Or should we just both be bad cop?
translation.fr:
On joue le gentil et le méchant ?
Ou deux méchants ?

translation.en: I think two bad-- I think bad cop, bad cop.
-[Conan] Bad cop, worse cop. -[Terry] Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Méchant et encore plus méchant.
- Oui.

translation.en: Here we go.
Can I get you anything? Coffee, anything you need?
translation.fr: Je vous sers quelque chose ? Un café ?

translation.en: Actually, yup, you know what, I'll have a breakfast burrito.
Uh, three eggs,
soft scrambled, onions and peppers,
Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
And you know what my favorite trick is?
translation.fr: Vous savez quel est mon tour favori ?

translation.en: Making that little thing disappear every morning.
translation.fr: Le faire disparaître tous les matins.

translation.en: Okay, no food for a murder suspect.
translation.fr: Pas de nourriture pour les suspects.

translation.en: Do you guys want anything?
Get out of here, Hughes. You're the worst.
translation.fr: Fiche le camp, Hughes. T'es nul.

translation.en: Now, you listen to me, Melvin. Grab a seat, O'Brien.
God, that started off so cool.
I know, I couldn't--
You flipped it and then you couldn't land it.
translation.fr: T'as pas réussi à aller au bout.

translation.en: No, I just-- I didn't think about it ahead of time.
[Terry] So, magic Melvin.
Can you see me through the mirror?
translation.fr: Vous me voyez dans le miroir ?

translation.en: Oh, hi. I talk to my wife like this when she's doing her makeup.
translation.fr:
Oui. Je parle à ma femme comme ça
quand elle se maquille.

translation.en: -You got a lot of jokes, Melvin. -Yeah, you got a lot of jokes.
Well, you know, as a magician I do have patter and I do like to have fun.
translation.fr:
En tant que magicien,
j'aime avoir du répondant et m'amuser.

translation.en: Tell my partner a joke.
Alright, so these two Jews walk into a--
-Jews, okay, no. We're not cool with that. -Okay, alright, we're not gonna do that.
[Terry] Do something else.
Alright. So, four or five Jews--
-No, no, no. -You know what? No.
[Terry] No, listen up, Melvin.
Do you know what happened to your former assistant, Sarah, today?
translation.fr:
Vous êtes au courant
pour votre ancienne assistante ?

translation.en: Yes, it's terrible. It's a magician's worst nightmare.
translation.fr:
Oui. C'est le pire cauchemar
d'un magicien.

translation.en: Unbelievable acting.
You don't seem that busted up about it and I wonder why?
translation.fr:
Ça n'a pas l'air de vous attrister.
Pourquoi ?

translation.en: 'Cause maybe you had something to do with it!
Detective, what are you accusing me of?
A young woman was murdered against her will today
translation.fr:
Une jeune femme a été tuée
contre son gré aujourd'hui,

translation.en: and if I find out that you had anything to do with it,
translation.fr:
et si j'apprends que vous y êtes
pour quelque chose,

translation.en: I swear to God, I will peel off your skin,
translation.fr: je vous jure que je vous dépècerai.

translation.en: eat it and then shit it out
translation.fr: Je mangerai votre peau, puis je la chierai

translation.en: and use that excrement
as fertilizer to grow a tree from which I will one day hang you from.
translation.fr:
comme engrais pour faire pousser un arbre
dont je vous pendrai.

translation.en: You're gonna die and we're going to watch you,
unless you tell us exactly, exactly what happened!
translation.fr:
sauf si vous nous dites précisément
ce qu'il s'est passé !

translation.en: -What happened? -What happened?
Detectives, I am as law-abiding as they come.
translation.fr:
Messieurs, il n'y a pas plus respectueux
de la loi que moi.

translation.en: I can give you an example.
Whenever I find something that's not mine, I always return it.
translation.fr:
je rends toujours
ce qui ne m'appartient pas.

translation.en: Such as this quarter I just found
translation.fr:
Comme cette pièce,
que je viens de trouver…

translation.en: -What the--? -behind your ear!
And wait! Oh, oh, my goodness. Look at this, another one!
translation.fr: Ça alors ! En voilà une autre !

translation.en: Can you see that?
Yeah, he's got it in his hand before…
That's incredible!
Quarters are very easy to lose behind your ears
translation.fr:
On les perd facilement
derrière les oreilles.

translation.en: -because they're small. -[Terry] 'cause they're small.
But if I mix it up just a little bit. You can hear it and I--
blow it, look at this.
And now it's a single half-dollar fifty-cent piece. [laughs]
translation.fr: C'est devenu une pièce de 50 centimes.

translation.en: Make sure to put that in your piggy bank.
-That is astounding. -It's not.
Holy shit.
He's always got one in the other hand.
translation.fr: Il en a une dans l'autre main.

translation.en: My jaw is on the floor.
Oh, well, then maybe we should clean it up.
-Actually, that was pretty cool. -Let me just clean up the jaw.
translation.fr:
- Pas mal.
- On va vous nettoyer.

translation.en: -[Conan] I like that one. -We don't need this thing anymore.
translation.fr:
- Ça m'a plu.
- Plus besoin de ça.

translation.en: So all we do a little pixie dust. Rub it on here and--
translation.fr: Un peu de poussière de fée. On frotte et…

translation.en: -[Conan] I didn't see-- Okay, that was… -[Terry] No way!
-That was insane. That was… -[Melvin] That's what I'm talking about.
-That was a solid B+ up-close trick. -I got to be honest with you--
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes fort.
- Je vais être honnête.

translation.en: I feel good, I feel like I'm good with this suspect. There's nothing.
translation.fr: J'ai rien à reprocher à ce suspect.

translation.en: No, I have questions.
Can you tell us what happened between you and your old assistant?
translation.fr:
Que s'est-il passé entre vous
et votre ancienne assistante ?

translation.en: Was there a falling out?
-I can tell you the whole story. -[Terry] Okay.
translation.fr:
- Je vais tout vous raconter.
- Bien.

translation.en: But first I just need some help from you.
translation.fr: Mais d'abord, il me faut un coup de main.

translation.en: -Okay. -If you don't mind.
Anything ever.
So, what I'd like you to do is, here's a deck of cards.
Don't they frisk people before they bring them into this interrogation room?
translation.fr:
On fouille pas les suspects
avant l'interrogatoire ?

translation.en: -Now. -[Terry] Okay.
-I'll spread these out and I want you-- -Looks like a regular deck of cards.
translation.fr:
- Je vais les étaler.
- C'est un jeu normal.

translation.en: Please, detective, to take any card you want.
translation.fr: Prenez la carte de votre choix.

translation.en: Any one, any card. Don't let me influence you.
translation.fr:
N'importe laquelle.
Ne vous laissez pas influencer.

translation.en: Just choose one. Is that the one you want? Do you want to change your mind?
-Okay. I do want to change my mind. -Very good.
I'm gonna take this one here.
We can be here all day. Thank you.
I'd love to be here-- I mean, I could watch this all day.
You've taken the card. Show it to your partner, please. Do not show it to me.
translation.fr:
Montrez la carte à votre équipier.
Mais pas à moi.

translation.en: I'm looking away, I'm looking down. Alright.
And now I'd like you to put it back anywhere you like in the deck.
I'm going to watch this hands this whole time. I'm gonna get this.
translation.fr:
Je vais surveiller ses mains.
Je veux comprendre.

translation.en: Eye on him.
And now, we're going to mix them up real good. And I will tell you
that Sarah was my assistant for a few months
translation.fr:
Sarah a été mon assistante
durant quelques mois,

translation.en: and everything was going great.
translation.fr: et tout se passait à merveille.

translation.en: She'd been doing a terrific job and then one day,
she just didn't show up for work,
translation.fr: où elle n'est pas venue travailler.

translation.en: and I thought it was strange. And then the next week,
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé ça étrange.
La semaine d'après,

translation.en: I saw that she was working for Captivating Keith
translation.fr:
j'ai vu qu'elle travaillait
pour Keith Le Captivant,

translation.en: and he was performing all my tricks!
translation.fr: et il réalisait tous mes tours !

translation.en: -She stole your tricks. -She stole your act.
translation.fr:
- Elle a volé vos tours.
- Votre numéro.

translation.en: -That's motive, right there. -That is motive, that is.
Aha, but I will tell you it's been a blessing
translation.fr: Mais c'était un mal pour un bien,

translation.en: because it took me out of my comfort zone
translation.fr:
car ça m'a forcé à sortir
de ma zone de confort

translation.en: and it forced me to take my act to the next level.
translation.fr:
et à repousser les limites
de mon spectacle.

translation.en: So I'm very thankful for this.
-Can I ask the two of you a question? -Yeah, ask away.
translation.fr:
- Je peux vous poser une question ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Sir, would you please lift up this tape recorder
that's been sitting here the entire time in full view
translation.fr: qui était à la vue de tous tout ce temps ?

translation.en: and you'll see that there is in fact a single playing card.
translation.fr:
Vous verrez
qu'une carte se trouve en dessous.

translation.en: Would you, for the very first time,
tell us what card you picked out of the deck?
It was the Queen of Spades.
Queen of Spades. And now, if you will just check
the card right there and tell us all, show us all
that it is, in fact, the Queen of Spades.
translation.fr: qu'il s'agit bien de la dame de pique ?

translation.en: Are you kidding?
Ladies and gentlemen.
That is sorcery!
That's incredible!
No one gets that excited about the cards.
translation.fr:
Personne ne s'emballe autant
pour des cartes.

translation.en: Are you--
Maybe if you're that scared, you should cuff me up.
Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah! Let me get in on this.
Let's see, okay, let's see. No way.
You know, the problem with handcuffs is that
they sometimes don't seem to work
especially on someone who knows actual magic!
[Terry] He did it!
Thank you very much.
Gentlemen, I would love to stick around all day and do my whole act,
but I have to get going. I have a children's show today
translation.fr:
mais je dois y aller.
J'ai un spectacle pour enfants

translation.en: and I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
translation.fr: et je dois laver mon lapin.

translation.en: So if I'm free to go…
Uh, gentlemen, I bid you farewell.
translation.fr: Messieurs, je vous dis au revoir.

translation.en: Hey, sorry, it's down the hall
through the double doors and then to the right or left?
translation.fr:
jusqu'à la porte,
puis à droite ou à gauche ?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, through the-- and to the-- to your right, yes.
-Right, okay. -Okay.
[Terry] We had one more suspect, and to get to her, Conan was going to have to make a house call.
translation.fr:
Quant à notre dernière suspecte,
Conan allait devoir lui rendre visite.

translation.en: Alright, this is the home of Kathy Johanson.
She's the leader of the local chapter of Mothers Against Magic Association.
translation.fr:
Elle est la présidente
de l'Association des Mamans Anti-Magie.

translation.en: They believe that magic can lead to the occult,
translation.fr:
L'association soutient que la magie
conduit aux sciences occultes,

translation.en: devil worship, and S-E-X.
translation.fr: au culte du diable, et au S-E-X-E.

translation.en: Sex.
You knew what I meant when I said--?
-Yeah. I spelled it out. -I see.
translation.fr:
- Oui. Je sais épeler.
- Je vois.

translation.en: So what I need you to do is, I need to get in there and infiltrate
translation.fr: Tu vas y aller et infiltrer l'asso

translation.en: and see if she is capable of murder.
translation.fr: pour voir si Kathy est capable de meurtre.

translation.en: And you're going to use this earpiece,
where I got an earpiece in and you're going to use this ear piece.
translation.fr: J'en ai une aussi. Tu utiliseras celle-là.

translation.en: And I'm going to put that in and I--
You're gonna put it in and you're just going to listen to what I got to tell you.
translation.fr:
Tu vas la mettre
et écouter ce que je te dis.

translation.en: And just do exactly as I say.
translation.fr: Suis mes instructions à la lettre.

translation.en: Okay.
But we need a code word. Obviously.
translation.fr: Il nous faut un nom de code.

translation.en: If things go south.
If things go south, we're going to need a code word.
translation.fr: Il nous en faut un, au cas où.

translation.en: I got it.
Tittynope.
Tittynope.
Yeah, you know what "Tittynope" means?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que ça veut dire ?

translation.en: No, I don't.
It's like a small gathering of like leftovers.
translation.fr:
C'est une petite quantité
de quelque chose.

translation.en: Like a crumbs or whatever on a plate.
-Oh, a little tittynope. -Yeah, it's a little tittynope.
This is a great ride, by the way.
Thank you.
Yeah, is it a car or a party favor?
translation.fr: C'est une voiture ou un jouet ?

translation.en: Oh, you're kidding.
I should go.
[Terry] Alright, Conan. I want you to approach the door and knock.
translation.fr:
C'est parti, Conan.
Va à la porte et frappe.

translation.en: Hello, there, lovely woman.
Well, hello there, lovely woman.
I'm sorry, but this is a private event for mothers only.
translation.fr:
Navrée, cet événement est réservé
aux mamans.

translation.en: Yeah, but I just moved to town.
Yeah, you see, I just moved to town.
And I really hate magic.
And I hate magic.
Can I get some kind of a day pass?
And I thought maybe I could get a day pass. Is that cool?
translation.fr: Vous voulez bien faire une exception ?

translation.en: What's your name?
It's Todd.
-It's Todd. -Todd, Todd what?
Todd Caring…
My name is Todd Caring.
Ton.
-Ton. -Berg.
Caringtonberg. My name--
Son.
I'm sorry, Todd Caringtonbergson, and--
Field.
Field.
Where are you from, Todd Caringtonbergensonfield?
Just pick a state that nobody lives in.
translation.fr: Choisis un État où personne ne vit.

translation.en: I'm from Idaho.
I grew up in Idaho.
You're doing great, partner. Really great.
But listen, you're on your own for a few minutes.
There's something really important I need to do.
translation.fr: J'ai un truc urgent à faire.

translation.en: I'm sure that you heard what happened to my son, Jimothy.
translation.fr:
Vous avez dû entendre parler
de mon fils, Jimothy.

translation.en: One day he was practicing coin tricks in front of the mirror.
translation.fr:
Un jour, il répétait avec des pièces
devant le miroir,

translation.en: The next, he's God knows where,
translation.fr: et le lendemain, il était je-ne-sais-où,

translation.en: doing street magic and playing Hide the Honker.
translation.fr: à faire de la magie dans la rue.

translation.en: Yes, so--
You'd think these magicians
would take responsibility for their actions, but they don't care.
translation.fr:
assumer les conséquences de leurs actes,
mais ils s'en fichent.

translation.en: I've been begging Captivating Keith for years to think of the children.
translation.fr:
Ça fait des années que je supplie
Keith Le Captivant de penser aux enfants.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Begged him.
And if that poor assistant of his, if her murder
translation.fr: Si le meurtre de sa pauvre assistante

translation.en: saves even one child from a life of magic,
translation.fr:
sauve ne serait-ce qu'un enfant
de la magie,

translation.en: it would have been worth it.
translation.fr: ça en aura valu la peine.

translation.en: -Can I make you a snack? -Yes.
translation.fr:
- Je vous sers à manger ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Todd.
-Yes, that's fine. -Okay.
Let me get you a bowl of Helen's famous chili!
translation.fr:
Je vais vous servir
le fameux chili d'Helen.

translation.en: Thank you, Helen.
Yeah, I can already believe--
Here, you're gonna want some of this on it
because, to be honest,
that cat food has more taste than this chili.
translation.fr:
la pâtée pour chat
a plus de goût que ce chili.

translation.en: So let me get this straight. You're angry and you're happy.
translation.fr:
Récapitulons.
Vous êtes furieuse et heureuse.

translation.en: I wouldn't say happy, it's a death. But
if you think about the power of death and life after.
translation.fr:
Mais si on réfléchit au pouvoir de la mort
et de la vie après la mort…

translation.en: -How's that? -It's so good.
-Yes? -It's so good.
Oh, my goodness.
[Kathy] I've got to get this meeting started!
Okay, let's sit you down right over here. Todd.
Oh. Oh, yes. Right here? Sure.
Hudson.
Thank you so much. Let's get started, ladies.
Why don't we gather around?
Okay, now before we get started,
I'd like to introduce a very special guest.
translation.fr: je vous présente un invité très spécial.

translation.en: Todd, go ahead and stand up. Don't be shy.
translation.fr: Todd, levez-vous. Ne soyez pas timide.

translation.en: -[ladies applauding] -Todd, ladies, this is Todd.
New members always give a testimonial
and I'd like you to stand here and tell this group of God-fearing women
translation.fr: Racontez à toutes ces dames croyantes

translation.en: the moment that you realized magic
translation.fr:
le moment où vous avez compris
que la magie

translation.en: is the devil's tool.
Well, I'll tell you all it was an incredible experience that I had.
translation.fr:
Eh bien, j'ai eu
une expérience incroyable.

translation.en: -[sad music] -I was a child
and I wanted to be a magician.
So I practiced and practiced
and became quite the magician, a very good magician.
translation.fr: et je suis devenu plutôt doué.

translation.en: And one day I went down to the school yard, and I said,
translation.fr: Un jour, dans la cour de récré, j'ai dit :

translation.en: "Check this out" and I fanned out my deck,
translation.fr:
"Regardez",
et j'ai déployé mon jeu de cartes.

translation.en: and before I could do anything else,
translation.fr: Avant même que je puisse continuer,

translation.en: they beat me.
They beat me for 40 minutes,
then they stopped,
and they went and got ice cream,
translation.fr: et ils sont allés manger une glace

translation.en: came back and continued beating me.
And what happened to the boys who beat you up?
Well, they all became senators. Every single one of them.
translation.fr: Ils sont tous devenus sénateurs. Tous.

translation.en: Name one.
Dianne Feinstein.
Was the head bully.
Beat me savagely.
It doesn't make any sense.
I'm starting to wonder if your name is even Todd Caringtonbergenson.
translation.fr:
Qui sait si Todd Caringtonbergsonfield
est votre vrai nom ?

translation.en: Oh, please.
Todd, what is the state fish of Idaho?
translation.fr:
Quel est le poisson emblématique
de l'Idaho ?

translation.en: It is a…
white-bellied cod.
[Kathy] Wrong!
It's the cutthroat trout.
Well, who knows the state fish?
This person is an imposter, ladies,
and he's using the art of illusion
translation.fr: Il recourt à l'art de l'illusion

translation.en: to get us to have S-E-X.
No!
Get him! Mama! Mama!
-Mama! Mama! Mama! -Tittynope! Tittynope!
[male voice] …just appeared then.
Now, we have to do French drop which is a ball transfer,
translation.fr: Maintenant, il faut transférer la balle.

translation.en: reach forward again, and again you say,
"Oh, is that another quarter in your ear?"
translation.fr: "Tu as une autre pièce dans l'oreille."

translation.en: [women] Mama! Mama! Mama!
Conan.
-[Conan] Tittynope. Tittynope. -Conan, what's going on? What's going on?
-Tittynope! Tittynope! -Mama! Mama!
Alright, lock yourself in a safe room, Conan.
I'm coming to save you.
-Tittynope! -Mama! Mama! Mama!
It's locked. We can wait him out, though.
translation.fr:
C'est fermé à clé.
On va attendre qu'il sorte.

translation.en: Ladies! There's a guy in the corner asking kids to pick a card.
translation.fr:
Dites ! Un type dans la rue
demande à des mômes de choisir une carte.

translation.en: Any card!
Conan! It's senior detective, Terry Seattle. You can come out now.
translation.fr:
Conan ! C'est l'inspecteur Terry Seattle.
Sors.

translation.en: You're safe.
-You're safe. Are you okay? -I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm good.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Oui, tout va bien.

translation.en: All right, let's get the hell out of--
Wow. Look at all these snacks.
Let's grab some stuff, come on.
They got plain tortillas. I can never find plain tortillas.
translation.fr:
Y a des tortillas nature.
J'en trouve jamais.

translation.en: Well, they're pretty available.
No, but every time I go to the grocery store, I'm like,
translation.fr: Dès que je vais au magasin,

translation.en: "Do you have any plain tortillas?" they're like, "No, we're fresh out."
translation.fr: ils sont en rupture de stock.

translation.en: They're very available.
Everyone has plain tortillas.
[Terry] It was time for Conan to decide
translation.fr: Il était temps pour Conan d'identifier

translation.en: who killed poor Sarah,
so we lured the three suspects back to the library
translation.fr:
On a donc attiré les trois suspects
à la bibliothèque

translation.en: under the guise of another magic show.
translation.fr:
en prétextant un spectacle de magie. L'ACCUSATION
BIBLIOTHÈQUE

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we will not be performing any illusions tonight.
translation.fr:
Mesdames et messieurs,
vous ne verrez pas d'illusions ce soir.

translation.en: No, in fact, if anything, we will be removing an illusion.
translation.fr: On va plutôt en dissiper une.

translation.en: The illusion
of innocence.
[Terry] That's right.
Before us here are these three top hats.
translation.fr: Nous avons trois chapeaux devant nous.

translation.en: In each one is the name of a suspect.
translation.fr: Chacun contient le nom d'un suspect.

translation.en: My partner, Conan O'Brien,
will now reveal who he believes committed this murder.
translation.fr:
va révéler qui il croit être
le coupable du meurtre.

translation.en: Conan, was it Deb,
was it Magic Melvin,
or was it Kathy?
Conan,
please choose who you think is the killer.
The murderer…!
Magic Melvin.
No.
[Rhonda] What is going on here?
Chief, we figured out who the killer is.
translation.fr: Chef, on sait qui est l'assassin.

translation.en: Conan figured it out.
I have all the logic as to why it has to be Magic Melvin.
translation.fr:
J'ai des arguments
qui prouvent que c'est Magic Melvin.

translation.en: I'm not sure exactly why I dressed as a magician,
translation.fr:
J'ignore pourquoi je suis déguisé
en magicien,

translation.en: but I am certain
he is the murderer.
And what is your evidence?
Magic Melvin,
you told us that you had to go Scotchgard your rabbit.
translation.fr:
vous nous avez dit
que vous deviez laver votre lapin.

translation.en: Maybe to keep hot sauce off the rabbit,
translation.fr:
Sans doute pour effacer
toutes traces de sauce piquante,

translation.en: because who leaves hot sauce on a saw and no fingerprints?
translation.fr:
car qui laisserait de la sauce
et aucune empreinte sur une scie ?

translation.en: Why, sir, that is the act
of a magician.
I also think you had another motive.
I think that Kathy is your mother.
That you hate your mother
and that because she's turned her back on magic,
translation.fr: Comme elle a renié la magie,

translation.en: you wanted to frame her.
That part's pretty far-fetched.
I'm the youngest person in this room.
translation.fr: Je suis la plus jeune ici.

translation.en: I understand.
And I don't know how the whole age thing works.
I'm still working on that.
It's very possible I could be your father.
-Yeah. -Age-wise.
Conan O'Brien,
it brings me no joy to tell you that you are…
translation.fr: je suis navrée de vous dire que vous avez…

translation.en: Correct.
Yes!
Yes!
[Rhonda] It was Magic Melvin who killed the magician's assistant.
translation.fr:
C'est bien Magic Melvin
qui a tué l'assistante du magicien.

translation.en: You did notice that Melvin put hot sauce on his breakfast burrito every morning.
translation.fr:
Melvin met de la sauce piquante
dans son burrito tous les matins.

translation.en: Three eggs soft scrambled, onions, peppers, Tabasco--
translation.fr:
Avec œufs brouillés, oignons,
poivrons, tabasco…

translation.en: And owned a rabbit for his act.
translation.fr: Et il a un lapin pour son spectacle.

translation.en: I have to Scotchgard my rabbit.
We know it couldn't have been Deb. She was allergic to pets.
translation.fr:
Ça ne pouvait pas être Deb.
Elle est allergique aux animaux.

translation.en: My boyfriend tried to cheer me up by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies!
translation.fr:
Mon petit ami m'a offert un chiot,
mais je suis allergique !

translation.en: Meanwhile Kathy had more motive than anyone,
but she didn't know how to pick the lock on the door
translation.fr:
mais elle était incapable
de crocheter la serrure

translation.en: when you ran like an overgrown gazelle for safety.
translation.fr:
quand vous avez couru comme une gazelle
pour vous mettre à l'abri.

translation.en: It's locked.
But you know who could pick a lock? Magic Melvin.
translation.fr:
Qui sait crocheter une serrure,
en revanche ? Magic Melvin.

translation.en: Especially on someone who knows actual--
-He did it! -[Melvin] Thank you very much.
Magic Melvin was the killer.
translation.fr: Le meurtrier était bien Magic Melvin.

translation.en: Take him away.
I only murdered her 'cause I wanted her dead!
translation.fr:
Je l'ai juste tuée
car je voulais qu'elle meure !

translation.en: It's a very-- It's a good reason to murder somebody.
translation.fr: C'est une bonne raison de tuer quelqu'un.

translation.en: The handcuffs are not going to work on him.
Already, no handcuffs.
[Rhonda] Conan O'Brien, congratulations.
Well, Conan, you did it.
You solved the case, even though your logic was…
translation.fr:
T'as résolu l'enquête,
même si ta logique n'avait…

translation.en: crazy nonsensical.
But you make a fantastic cop.
You know, I also learned something.
I learned a little magic trick.
You learned magic.
That's right. Go ahead and sneeze.
Here.
Let me get you a handkerchief.
Go ahead.
I've got a handkerchief.
It's not ending. It's not ending.
This is legitimately not ending.
-It's a lot of-- -I'm getting--
Okay, you know what? Now, I just hate magic. This is stupid.
translation.fr: Bon, je déteste la magie. C'est stupide.

translation.en: [Terry] On the next episode of Murderville…
[Rhonda] Terry say hi to your new partner, Marshawn Lynch.
translation.fr:
Terry, voici ton nouvel équipier :
Marshawn Lynch.

translation.en: -How much training have you had? -I watched Training Day.
translation.fr:
- T'as suivi une formation ?
- J'ai vu Training Day.

translation.en: This was the murder weapon.
